noun
  1. warmth, heat; the warmed state of something, warmth emanating from something
  2. warmth; the warmed state of the air, its temperature above 0°C
  3. heat, swelter
  4. (figuratively) warmth, cordiality, kindness

adj
  1. warm, warmed; containing or giving warmth
  2. (of climate, region) warm, hot, southern
  3. warm; providing protection from cold
  4. hot, having a high temperature
  5. (of weather) hot, sultry
  6. (figuratively) warm, cordial, kind, friendly
  7. (figuratively) hot-tempered, easily angered or frustrated
  8. (figuratively) busy, demanding focus (of time)
  9. (figuratively) ardent, passionate

noun
  1. nightingale (Luscinia megarhynchos)
  2. whistle (device blown on to produce a high-pitched sound)
